title: Ford's Theatre: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Photos and Multimedia: Experience the Icons               History, Where History Happened               News: Find Out What's Happening               Management: Making Historic Decisions Every Day               Education: An Avenue to History         Â    Park News Visit our Park News page for more information on the latest happenings at Ford's Theatre National Historic Site.   History and Culture  Go in-depth into the history of Ford's Theatre National Historic Site.   Become a Junior Ranger Download and complete the Junior Ranger Booklet to earn your badge.   Park Management Policy documents, contact phone numbers and other important information about Site management. Ford's Theatre is under the administration of National Mall and Memorial Parks.
